item.title: Can't pick anything up! lost all my players! please help! ='(
item.dc:creator: @de_dust89 de dust89
item.description:
@de_dust89 wrote:

Everyone on my server randomly could not pick any items up… it usually always worked to pick something up… I do not have a onpickup or offpickup command, so if someone can send me those it might help, but i do have a resetdrops command, and it looks like this…

private void customCommand(String command) { if(command.startsWith("resetdrop") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("previn")) { ItemHandler.resetItemDrop(); yell("["+playerName+"] - turned on drops."); }

And in ItemHandler the resetItemDrop() looks like this…

	public static void resetItemDrop() {
		for(int i = 0; i <= 5000; i++) {
			globalItemID[i] = 0;
		}
	}

I did restart the server, client ect… but nothing happend… so i think some code got fucked up? please help, i already lost all of my players =’(

Read full topic
item.source: Can't pick anything up! lost all my players! please help! ='(
